Objectives**: Initial reconnaissance of the application layer.
Multiple SSH login attempts, initial failures followed by successful logins.
Objectives**: Gaining access (credential stuffing or brute force).
Capabilities**: Moderate; success in access indicated capability to target SSH.
Lateral Movement/Data Theft**: Successful access at stage 2 suggests potential for laterally moving.
Attacker's Objectives**: Initial exploitation of SSH on bastion-01 with low-level probing on app-01. No successful lateral movement or data theft has been established yet.
Capability Maturity**: Moderate at best, focusing on gaining access rather than advanced exploitation or data exfiltration.
Protocols/Services**: Successful SSH attacks indicate a focus on remote access. HTTPS querying implies an interest in API accessibility.
Risk Level**: Increased risk on bastion-01; other hosts remain unsecured but unobserved, indicating potential avenues for future attacks.
